amendment.description: Amendment directs the DOD to engage in outreach to businesses in the vicinity of DOD installations to notify them of opportunities to obtain contracts and subcontracts to perform work at such installations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 111-467 to direct the DOD to engage in outreach to businesses in the vicinity of DOD installations to notify them of opportunities to obtain contracts and subcontracts to perform work at such installations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Edwards (MD) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Edwards (MD) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Edwards (MD).
